description:
Yuuna tags along to Kogarashi, Sagiri, and Chisaki`s seaside school trip. However, through the suggestion of another Chuuma ninja member, Urara, Sagiri needs to buy a new swimsuit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seme Sugiru Sagiri-san / Rinkai Gakkou to Kogarashi-kun
The Overly Aggressive Sagiri / The Seaside School and Kogarashi
攻め過ぎる狭霧さん / 臨海学校とコガラシくん
